name: ДСМ на github.io
body:
## Projects ### [dsmblog](dsmblog/). ### Static blog made by [pelican](http://blog.getpelican.com/) generator. Base language is Russian. _[code on github](https://github.com/dmisem/dsmblog)_ ## About me!
My name is Dmitry Semenov.
On graduating at the mechanic-mathematical faculty of Taras Shevchenko University of Kyiv I work in mathematical and computer modeling and analyzing, software development.
I participate in projects of different complexity developing and lecture at the faculty of information systems and technologies of KNEU after Vadim Getman.
### My working tools #### DB, system and application programming * **Delphi** - IDE for projects under Windows systems. * **Lazarus** - IDE for cross-platform RAD projects with GUI. * **Python** - Language for system scripting under Linux and cross-platform projects. * **Qt** - cross-platform GUI development under python (*PyQt*) * **Firebird** - free DBMS, the best with Delphi or Lazarus. Used as full-stack db-server or embedded for local projets * **MS SQL-Server** - for training purposes as part of lecturing. * **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL** - DBMS for web-projects. * **SQLite** - platform-independent DBMS for small local (on LAN level) projects. * **MS Access** - platform-independent DBMS for small local (on LAN level) projects. [me on github](https://github.com/dmisem)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
